speech: {petName} is waiting for you! As a caring owner, you'll be rewarded with different badges. Collect the badges to move on to the next level and unlock new food or toys for {petName}! You can start by playing or feeding {petName}.
Remember to come back often and play with {petName}! The more you play with your pet, the happier they become. Let's start playing!
text: {petName} is waiting for you! As a caring owner, you'll be rewarded with different badges. Collect the badges to move on to the next level and unlock new food or toys for {petName}! You can start by playing or feeding {petName}.

play_with_pet_msg: The happier {petName} becomes, the more trust will be built between you and {petName}. So play with {petName} more often and unlock new activities you can do with your pet!
play_with_pet_too_tired: <audio src='https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/virtual-pet2.appspot.com/o/j-snore.mp3?alt=media&token=fbf53ef6-3473-42ad-acfb-ab3df77bb97f'/> Sorry, {petName} is too tired to play. Feed {petName} to boost up the energy level! Then you can play with your pet again!
show_new_badge: You got it! Here's your new badge.
moving_to_level_two: You earned a {badgeName} <audio src='https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/virtual-pet2.appspot.com/o/j-award.mp3?alt=media&token=c178f1bd-5085-4a76-8f6a-20cf22e8b994'/> and you're moving to level two! You can keep feeding or playing with {petName}
moving_to_next_unlock_new_toy: You earned a {badgeName} <audio src='https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/virtual-pet2.appspot.com/o/j-award.mp3?alt=media&token=c178f1bd-5085-4a76-8f6a-20cf22e8b994'/> and you just unlocked a new toy for {petName}! Now, you can let {petName} running in the ball. {petName} looks very excited for the new toy!
say_granted_badge: and you earned a {badgeSaying}.<audio src='https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/virtual-pet2.appspot.com/o/j-award.mp3?alt=media&token=c178f1bd-5085-4a76-8f6a-20cf22e8b994'/> Now, let's play with {petName}. {petName} loves running in the wheel and playing in the maze. Which one do you prefer?
give_nickname: Alright, I'll just call you Hammy then.
choose_different_pet: Sorry, we just sold the last {animal}. You'll just have to stick with this hamster. Trust me, you will love this little ball of fur<audio src='https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/virtual-pet2.appspot.com/o/j-chipmunk-joy-scream-1.mp3?alt=media&token=f6dcc08f-f618-4590-bafd-d8640ce0ee14'/>
help: You can play with your hamster or feed your pet. There are 3 options for food and 2 options for things to do. As you progress in this game, you will unlock new food or activity for your pet. So do come back often! Now, you can choose broccoli, carrot or sunflower seed. Or you can play with your hamster in the maze or in the wheel.
cancel: {petName} will miss you! Come back to check on {petName}
show_food_type: You can feed your pet broccoli, carrot or sunflower seeds. Which one would you like?
database_error: Sorry, something went wrong. Check back later.
